Let's make the Internet a safer place.

The internet has become a wonderful place to spread ideas and beliefs, and no one should be scared to share them online. The purpose of this extension is to make people more “mindful” of the things you say online, so more people can feel free to express themselves online.

Meet Mindful:

Mindful Extension is a Chrome browser extension that uses the power of sentiment analysis and machine leaning to let users see the value of what they type online in real time – through emojis.

Realtime Sentiment

Get real time feedback on the sentiment of the things you type online in a format you can understand – emojis.

Advanced Text Analysis

Using powerful and advanced machine learning, the extension highlights text that is toxic, sexually explicit, obscene and much more.

Simple Blacklist Feature

Control which websites the extensions perform analysis on through a simple interface in the extension popup.

Let's make the Internet a safer place.
